hero.desc:
I develop mobile applications that solve business tasks and delight iOS and Android users.

From idea to release — I work from scratch or join an existing project. Always focused on results and quality user experience.

marquee.publish: Publishing to RuStore and Google Play

about.mobile_desc:
I develop mobile applications that solve business tasks and delight iOS and Android users.

From idea to release — I work from scratch or join an existing project. Always focused on results and quality user experience.
about.exp_text:
Started with freelancing, worked in product and outsourcing teams, participated in launching several startups.

I understand how to organize the process so the project doesn't get stuck at the idea stage.
about.spec_text:
I work with both native technologies (Swift, Kotlin) and cross-platform (Flutter).

I handle the full cycle: from UI design to store publication and technical support.

item.title: Habit and productivity tracker
item.desc:
A mobile app for tracking habits, small goals and productivity.

Users can create recurring tasks, mark completion, and analyze progress by days and weeks.
